meanings.definition: An organism or cell that has undergone a genetic change resulting in a new characteristic.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the mutant to understand its unique trait.
meanings.sent2: The mutant plant had a vibrant color unlike the others.
meanings.sent3: The mutant in the lab had a funny way of wiggling around.
meanings.sent4: The mutant gene stood out like a bright star in the DNA sequence.
meanings.sent5: The mutant fish with two tails was hard to forget.

meanings.definition: A person or thing that is different from others of the same kind.
meanings.sent1: The little girl felt like a mutant among her classmates.
meanings.sent2: The mutant in the movie had special powers that amazed everyone.
meanings.sent3: The mutant tree in the forest looked like it was waving hello.
meanings.sent4: The mutant flower in the garden seemed to dance in the breeze.
meanings.sent5: The mutant cloud in the sky resembled a fluffy monster.
